meanings.definition: Not involving or related to work.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the nonwork activities during the weekend.
meanings.sent2: His nonwork clothes were much more comfortable than his work uniform.
meanings.sent3: The nonwork picnic turned into a spontaneous dance party.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a nonwork paradise, away from the stress of the office.
meanings.sent5: The nonwork atmosphere was so relaxing, it felt like a vacation.

meanings.definition: The state of not working or being employed.
meanings.sent1: After the layoffs, many faced a period of nonwork.
meanings.sent2: She found solace in the peacefulness of nonwork.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to envy the dog's nonwork lifestyle.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of imagination, nonwork was a realm of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The transition from work to nonwork was like stepping into a different world.
